trans-unit.source: Provides methods and attached properties that support data validation.
For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md).
Adds an event handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error"></xref> attached event to the specified object.
The or object to add handler to.
The handler to add.
Removes all <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects from the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref> object.
The `bindingExpression` object may have been invalid from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A> call or a previously failed validation.
The object is valid after this call.
The object to turn valid.
If bindingExpression is `null`.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error"></xref> attached event.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors"></xref> attached property.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate"></xref> attached property.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors"></xref> attached property of the specified element.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to read the value from.
A <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyObservableCollection`1"></xref> of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects.
If element is `null`.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate"></xref> attached property of the specified element.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to read the value from.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"></xref> used to generate validation error feedback on the adorner layer.
If element is `null`.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError"></xref> attached property of the specified element.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to read the value from.
The value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError"></xref> attached property of the specified element.
If element is `null`.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite"></xref> attached property for the specified element.
The element from which to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite"></xref>.
The value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite"></xref>.
Gets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor"></xref> attached property for the specified element.
The element from which to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor"></xref>.
The value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError"></xref> attached property.
Marks the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object as invalid with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> object.

The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object stays invalid until <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A> is called or another transfer to the binding source validates successfully.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object to mark as invalid.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> object to use.
If validationError is `null`.
Adds an event handler for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error"></xref> attached event from the specified object.
The or object to remove handler from.
The handler to remove.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate"></xref> attached property to the specified element.
The or object to set value on.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"></xref> to use to generate validation error feedback on the adorner layer.
If element is `null`.
Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite"></xref> attached property to the specified value on the specified element.
The element on which to set the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite"></xref> of the specified element.
Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor"></xref> attached property to the specified value on the specified element.
The element on which to set the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor"></xref> of the specified element.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor"></xref> attached property.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite"></xref> attached property.
